SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
FileSystemStorageService
Service class that manages saving and retrieving files from the dynamic storage
HomeController
Controller we use for accessing the home page
LoginController
Controls creation and access of users
Post
A persistent model class that contains information about a post
PostDto
A DTO class for the posts
PostNotFoundException
The exception to throw if the post wasn't found in the database
PostRepository
Post repository
PostService
A service that is used to work with posts
Resource
Persistent model class that contains info about a resource (a file in the dynamic storage)
ResourceController
Controller that is used to get the resources
ResourceRepository
Repository of posts
SecurityConfig
Configuration of Spring Security
StorageException
Exceptions that StorageService can use
StorageProperties
The configuration of the dynamic storage.
StorageService
An interface for the dynamic storage service
User
Persistent model class that contains info about a user
UserDto
The DTO record for the User objects
UserModelDetails
User details class
UserProfileController
Controller used to access user's profiles
UserRepository
Repository of users
UserService
The service that gets user's details
WrtrApplication
Main app launcher
WrtrErrorController
Controller that manages delivering showing the user error codes
